languages.text: "Понимаю, это смелая гипотеза, и Лорд-инквизитор может приказать повесить меня за смерть Чорда. Но моя жизнь и так на кону, так что я не прочь рискнуть".
"I realise it's a bold hypothesis, and the Lord Inquisitor may have me hanged for Chorda's death. But my life is at stake as it is, so I may as well take the risk."
languages.original_text: "Понимаю, это смелая гипотеза, и Лорд-инквизитор может приказать повесить меня за смерть Чорда. Но моя жизнь и так на кону, так что я не прочь рискнуть".

traits.locale_text: "I realise it's a bold hypothesis and the Lord Inquisitor may have me hanged for Chorda's death. But my life is at stake as it is, so I may as well take the risk."
"I realise it's a bold hypothesis and the Lord Inquisitor may have me hanged for Chorda's death. But my life is at stake as it is, so I may as well take the risk."
"I realise it's a bold hypothesis, and the Lord Inquisitor may have me hanged for Chorda's death. But my life is at stake as it is, so I may as well take the risk."

"I realise it's a bold hypothesis, and the Lord Inquisitor may have me hanged for Chorda's death. But my life is at stake as it is, so I may as well take the risk."

languages.text: “我猜这是个相当大胆的假设。大审判官大人说不定会因为库尔达的死而绞死我，但既然我的性命已经危在旦夕，我恐怕只能赌一把。”
languages.original_text: "I realise it's a bold hypothesis, and the Lord Inquisitor may have me hanged for Chorda's death. But my life is at stake as it is, so I may as well take the risk."

traits.locale_text: “我猜这是个相当大胆的假设。审判长大人说不定会因为库尔达的死而绞死我，但既然我的性命已经危在旦夕，我恐怕只能赌一把。”

languages.text: 「大胆な仮説であることは理解しているし、ロード・インクィジターはチョーダの死の罰として、私を絞首刑にするかもしれない。しかし、どうせ命が危険にさらされているなら、危険を背負ってみようではないか」
languages.original_text: "I realise it's a bold hypothesis, and the Lord Inquisitor may have me hanged for Chorda's death. But my life is at stake as it is, so I may as well take the risk."

traits.locale_text: 「大胆な仮説であることは理解しているし、ロード・インクィジターはチョーダの死の罰として、私を絞首刑にするかもしれない。しかし、どうせ命が危険にさらされているなら、危険を背負ってみようではないか」

languages.text: «Es una hipótesis atrevida y el Lord Inquisidor puede hacer que me cuelguen por la muerte de Chorda, pero mi vida ya está en juego, así que puedo correr el riesgo».
languages.original_text: "I realise it's a bold hypothesis, and the Lord Inquisitor may have me hanged for Chorda's death. But my life is at stake as it is, so I may as well take the risk."

traits.locale_text: «Es una hipótesis atrevida y el Lord Inquisidor puede hacer que me cuelguen por la muerte de Chorda, pero mi vida ya está en juego, así que puedo correr el riesgo».

languages.text: "Mir ist klar, dass das eine kühne Hypothese ist, und der Großinquisitor lässt mich für Chordas Tod vielleicht hängen. Aber mein Leben steht ohnehin auf dem Spiel, also kann ich das Risiko auch eingehen."
languages.original_text: "I realise it's a bold hypothesis, and the Lord Inquisitor may have me hanged for Chorda's death. But my life is at stake as it is, so I may as well take the risk."

traits.locale_text: "Mir ist klar, dass das eine kühne Hypothese ist, und der Großinquisitor lässt mich für Chordas Tod vielleicht hängen. Aber mein Leben steht ohnehin auf dem Spiel, also kann ich das Risiko auch eingehen."

languages.text: « Je sais que c'est une hypothèse qui ne manque pas d'audace et que le seigneur inquisiteur pourrait très bien me faire pendre pour la mort de Chorda, mais ma vie est déjà sur le fil, alors autant prendre le risque. »
languages.original_text: "I realise it's a bold hypothesis, and the Lord Inquisitor may have me hanged for Chorda's death. But my life is at stake as it is, so I may as well take the risk."

traits.locale_text: « Je sais que c'est une hypothèse qui ne manque pas d'audace et que le seigneur inquisiteur pourrait très bien me faire pendre pour la mort de Chorda, mais ma vie est déjà sur le fil, alors autant prendre le risque. »

languages.text: "Cüretkâr bir iş, biliyorum. Lord Engizisyoncu, Chorda'nın ölümü için kellemi de alabilir. Lakin zaten kelle koltukta geziyorum, yani bu riski de göze alabilirim."
languages.original_text: "I realise it's a bold hypothesis, and the Lord Inquisitor may have me hanged for Chorda's death. But my life is at stake as it is, so I may as well take the risk."

traits.locale_text: "Cüretkâr bir iş, biliyorum. Lord Engizisyoncu, Chorda'nın ölümü için kellemi de alabilir. Lakin zaten kelle koltukta geziyorum, yani bu riski de göze alabilirim."
